choose.when: INSERT INTO users (user_id, username, email, password, phone, role, status) VALUES (#{userId}, #{username}, #{email}, #{password}, #{phone}, #{role}, #{status})
choose.otherwise: INSERT INTO users (username, email, password, phone, role, status) VALUES (#{username}, #{email}, #{password}, #{phone}, 'USER', 'ACTIVE')

mapper.select: SELECT * FROM users WHERE email = #{email} AND password = #{password} AND status = 'ACTIVE'
SELECT password FROM users WHERE username = #{username} AND email = #{email}
